00049 //
00050 // DocListIterator
00051 //
00052 // 9 January 2004 - tds
00053 //
00054 
00055 #ifndef INDRI_DOCLISTITERATOR_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_DOCLISTITERATOR_HPP
00057 
00058 #include "indri/DocPositionInfoList.hpp"
00059 #include "indri/DocListFileIterator.hpp"
00060 #include "indri/DocListInfo.hpp"
00061 
00062 #define KEYFILE_DOCLISTITERATOR_DEFAULT_BUFFERSIZE   (128*1024)
00063 #define KEYFILE_DOCLISTITERATOR_MAX_BUFFERSIZE      (1024*1024)
00064 
00065 namespace indri {
00066   namespace index {
00067     class DocListIterator : public DocPositionInfoList {
00068     private:
00069       mutable DocListFileIterator _fileIterator;  // a file iterator that is iterating over all term/document postings
00070       int _termID;  // termID of the term for which we're interested in reading document positions
00071       mutable bool _atNext; // if true, this means that the file iterator already points to the next document
00072       mutable bool _finished;  // if true, then we have read all postings for this term already
00073 
00074     public:
00075       DocListIterator( File& segment,
00076                               int termID,
00077                               File::offset_type seekLocation = 0,
00078                               INT64 estimatedDataLength = KEYFILE_DOCLISTITERATOR_DEFAULT_BUFFERSIZE );
00079       ~DocListIterator();
00080 
00081       // get the iterator ready to return data; call this before calling currentEntry or nextEntry
00082       void startIteration() const;
00083 
00086       bool hasMore() const;
00087 
00088       // move to the next document in the list; return null if there are no more valid documents
00089       DocInfo* nextEntry() const ;
00090 
00091       // find the first document that contains this term that has an id >= documentID.
00092       // returns null if no such document exists.
00093       DocInfo* nextEntry( DOCID_T documentID );
00094 
00095       // return the current document entry if we're not finished, null otherwise.
00096       DocInfo* currentEntry();
00097 
00098       // iterator support functions
00099       virtual DocInfo* newElement() const { return new DocListInfo(); }
00100       virtual void assignElement(DocInfo* to, DocInfo* from) const { 
00101         DocListInfo *tmp = dynamic_cast<DocListInfo *>(to);
00102         DocListInfo *cur = dynamic_cast<DocListInfo*>(from);
00103         *tmp = *cur;
00104       }
00105 
00107       virtual DocInfo* getElement(DocInfo* elem, POS_T position) const;
00109       virtual POS_T beginPosition() const;
00111       virtual POS_T endPosition() const;
00113       virtual POS_T nextPosition(POS_T position) const;
00114     };
00115   }
00116 }
00117 
00118 #endif // INDRI_DOCLISTITERATOR_HPP
